title: Simple Arrabbiata Sauce
directions: In a large saucepan, combine tomatoes, olive oil, and red pepper flakes. Simmer 30 to 40 minutes, or until sauce is thickened. Stir in garlic, and simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in basil, salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste
